{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.03263v1", "title": "Rank two Weak Fano bundles on Fano threefolds of Picard rank one", "summary": "We classify rank two vector bundles on a Fano threefold of Picard rank one
whose projectivizations are weak Fano. We also prove the existence of examples
for each case of the classification result. Our classification includes
detailed resolutions of them on the quadric threefold.", "main_category": "math.AG", "categories": "math.AG", "published": "2025-05-06T07:46:32Z"}
